title: Delicious Things Are for Sharing
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hnn! This is delicious! How surprising~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It is, right! Mango milk is really popular with μ’s now~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Is that so. I was really nervous trying it at first though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu. I thought of the same thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s really hard to imagine, huh. Strawberry and banana milk is common though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I wonder if there’s mikan milk? Chika-san seems like she’ll like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Mikan milk? I haven’t seen that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Why don’t we try to make it ourselves?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s a good idea! Let’s try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Let’s make it delicious and surprise her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
